Text:
Mind putting an instructions .txt file in your torrents?

I always seem to mess things up.

@osaka
there is the install file [.exe] and there is patch .. why do u need instruction!!

but if ur having trouble -
1) run exe file instll completely!
2)restart when prompted !
3)after restart right click on taskbar anti-trojan elite and quit!
4)open patch file - IN ADMINISTRATOR MODE [VERY IMPORATANT]
5)patch will ask to search for TWO fileS
patch accordingly and done!!
thanks i will seed... keep up the good work
